lead_paragraph: North Carolina and Coach Butch Davis agreed to a one-year contract extension through the 2014 season, university officials said. Davis will receive a raise of $291,000 that will push his annual income to about $2.1 million. Davis is 3-8 in his first season in Chapel Hill but had been rumored as a possible candidate at Arkansas — his home-state university — if the Razorbacks make a coaching change.
